name: The Fullilove Consulting Group
goal: The Fullilove Consulting Group provides information and advocacy services to North American based insurance interests. We cover both European and international developments in financial services, insurance and accounting.
interests: Banking and financial services, Climate Action, Competition, Consumers, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Environment, Single market, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives: Insurance (Solvency II), equivalence, financial services, climate change, trade, TTIP, privacy and data protection, intermediaries, accounting
